landing.tagline: A community that helps each other ‚Äî donations, support, resources and human connections.

1.title: Mutual aid
1.text: Posts of requests/offers to help in any area: food, furniture, time, knowledge and more.

2.title: Chats and community
2.text: Private and group chat, topic discussions, notifications for what matters to you.

3.title: Proximity and discovery
3.text: Search by location and interests, tailored recommendations, follow orgs and people.

4.title: Community organizations
4.text: Organizations have a dashboard, volunteers/resources management and approval flows.

paragraph.1: I'm a product developer who believes in the power of community. KarmaCommunity was born to make good more accessible ‚Äî
paragraph.2: to connect those in need with those who can help, transparently and simply. Happy to chat if you'd like to hear more.

paragraph.1: Karma Community (KC) presents a non-profit social network, combining capitalist efficiency with humanity and collaboration.
paragraph.2: A digital space enabling everyone to give and receive ‚Äî time, money, items and knowledge ‚Äî with a feed full of community action.
paragraph.3: Our motto: Giving is also receiving.

bullet.1: Duplication ‚Äî wasted resources and unnecessary competition
bullet.2: Trust ‚Äî standardization and transparency for donations and initiatives
bullet.3: Community ‚Äî building a soft and strong network in parallel

solution.title: The solution
solution.text: A unified, easy-to-use, transparent app ‚Äî surfaces nearby giving/getting opportunities, connects people and orgs, and builds trust and cooperation.

1.title: Join
1.text: Sign up quickly, choose language and interests.

2.title: Discover
2.text: Find requests/offers by location, topic and community.

3.title: Act
3.text: Connect, help, share ‚Äî and the community grows.

individuals.title: Individuals
individuals.text: Sharing items, food donations, study help, small repairs, rides, emotional support, community discussion and more.

orgs.title: Organizations
orgs.text: Unified dashboard for requests, volunteers and resources; trust and transparency; approval flows.

values.title: Our values
values.subtitle: No ads, no harmful content, strong community

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: We'd love to chat, collaborate or welcome you

faq.a1: Yes. It's a community initiative aiming to remain accessible to everyone.
faq.a2: Join as a user, join groups, or reach out for collaborations.
faq.q3: Is the app available for Android/iOS?
faq.a3: Yes. We have Android and iOS versions, and a convenient web version.

1.text: I found a volunteer who fixed my door in a day! Amazing to have a community that helps so fast.

2.text: We donated furniture through the app to a local family. It was simple and transparent.

3.text: I found free math tutoring for an elderly neighbor. A wonderful connection formed.

partners.title: Partners and communities
partners.subtitle: On the way, in action, by our side

point.3: Privacy and respect for every user

step.1: Fill a form ‚Äî basic details, goals and needs.
step.2: Short verification ‚Äî transparency check, documents and contact details.
step.3: Launch ‚Äî dashboard, posts, volunteers and resources.

paragraph.1: In an era of noise, ads and interests ‚Äî we choose community. A community that values action, solidarity and good spirit.
paragraph.2: Together we can connect needs to abilities, hearts to hands. Good is infrastructure, not a product.
paragraph.3: We commit to transparency, human dignity and a safe digital space. Together we build infrastructure that empowers community action ‚Äî everywhere.

moreTestimonials.title: More stories from the field
moreTestimonials.item1: I met neighbors through KC, and suddenly there's a building community. Small things that make change. ‚Äî Ilan, Petah Tikva
moreTestimonials.item2: As a small org we got massive exposure to quality volunteers. The dashboard saved us hours. ‚Äî Yad LaLev NGO
moreTestimonials.item3: Gave a few hours a week, got a huge sense of meaning and new friends. ‚Äî Sivan, Ramat Gan

moreFaq.title: More questions
moreFaq.a1: We minimize data collection and give users control over visibility and exposure.
moreFaq.a2: No. The platform is ad-free and focuses solely on community content.
moreFaq.q3: How do I report an issue?
moreFaq.a3: There's a built-in reporting mechanism on every post/chat. You can also contact us directly via WhatsApp.
